author: James Laird
title: WrestleMania 36 live stream: watch the biggest WWE event of 2020 online for free
description: Part two of 2020's biggest WWE PPV event has arrived - here's how to watch WrestleMania 36 for free and live stream all the action online right now.
content: WWE's WrestleMania may be a different beast in 2020, but it's still the most prestigious event on the professional wrestling calendar. The coronavirus pandemic means this year's Showcase of the Immortals is being spread over two days, so the biggest fights ar… [+10421 chars]
